transcripts.text: To fix the economy, we have to get control over the virus.  I'm releasing a plan to save lives in the months ahead.  We need to increase federal support for testing, doubling the number of drive-through testing sites.  We absolutely need a clear message from the very top of our federal government that everyone needs to wear a mask in public.  Every single frontline worker should have the personal protective equipment that they need to be safe.  We need to support schools and childcare programs so parents, if and when they can return to work,
